vote.title: Authorize a (1) one- year service contract for employment and workforce training services for formerly incarcerated individuals for the Small Business Center - Regional Black Contractors Association of North Texas, Inc. in the amount of $500,000; and (2) two-year service contract for re-entry career pathway services for the Small Business Center - Volunteers of America Texas, Inc. in the amount of $250,000 and First Step Community Empowerment in the amount of $250,000, most advantageous proposers of five - Total not to exceed $1,000,000 - Financing:  General Fund ($500,000) and Texas Department of Criminal Justice Grant ($500,000) (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize a (1) one- year service contract for employment and workforce training services for formerly incarcerated individuals for the Small Business Center - Regional Black Contractors Association of North Texas, Inc. in the amount of $500,000; and (2) two-year service contract for re-entry career pathway services for the Small Business Center - Volunteers of America Texas, Inc. in the amount of $250,000 and First Step Community Empowerment in the amount of $250,000, most advantageous proposers of five - Total not to exceed $1,000,000 - Financing:  General Fund ($500,000) and Texas Department of Criminal Justice Grant ($500,000) (subject to annual appropriations)
